metadata.title: CVE-2014-6395 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the dissector_postgresql function indissectors/ec_postgresql.c in Ettercap before 0.8.1 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code via acrafted password length value that is inconsistent with the actual lengthof the password.

criterions.comment: ettercap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
